description: When processing HTTP requests, genie.cgi retrieves unvalidated user input via getenv('QUERY_STRING') and uses it to construct curl request URLs. Although snprintf is employed for formatting, input containing special characters may still lead to server-side request forgery (SSRF) or command injection vulnerabilities.
The program uses an insecure strncpy operation when processing HTTP responses, which may lead to buffer overflow or information disclosure risks.
